lead_paragraph: The NBC commentator criticized for calling the coach and husband of Hungarian swimmer Katinka Hosszu "the guy responsible" for her turnaround said Sunday it is "impossible" to tell Hosszu's story without crediting him.

headline.print_headline: NBC Swim Commentator Defends Comments Criticized as Sexist
headline.main: NBC Swim Commentator Defends Comments Criticized as Sexist

snippet: The NBC commentator criticized for calling the coach and husband of Hungarian swimmer Katinka Hosszu "the guy responsible" for her turnaround said Sunday it is "impossible" to tell Hosszu's story without crediting him....
